page.title: 14 Sport in Halesowen
page.content: Halesowen Town Football Club is on the Stourbridge Road. Last year they won the Midlands Premier League and in April 1985 the F.A.Vase at Wembley. Halesowen Cricket Club has many members of all ages. One of our school group is a member. He plays wicket keeper. There is a practice every Monday night. Halesowen Athletics Club is on the by-pass, Manor Way. It also has a cycling and tennis club. It is by the ruins of St Mary's Abbey. Halesowen Swimming Pool is the centre not only for the swimming club but also a squash club, a keep fit club and the 'Swim For It' club which raises money for charity causes.
